mention.text: `` ABUJA -LRB- Reuters -RRB- - Nigeria 's Army has posted two divisions to hunt for 200 schoolgirls abducted last month by Islamist rebels in an attack condemned globally including by U.S. first lady Michelle Obama on Saturday .
an attack condemned globally including by U.S. first lady Michelle Obama on Saturday
The government of President Goodluck Jonathan
the girls , who were taking exams
a Boko Haram stronghold near the school
President Barack Obama 's weekly radio address
millions of people across the globe
more than 200 Nigerian girls from their school dormitory in the middle of the night
Boko Haram 's fight for an Islamic state
